commitResults.messageTitle: feat: add greet, echo and exit Added ui package to group chatbot interface implementations.
feat: add storing and listing of user text
refactor: move input parsing to Command class Added method to parse user input command to separate name and arguments.
feat: add ability to change task done status
feat: add differentiation for type of tasks Changed Task to abstract class, and implemented ToDo, Event and Deadline subclasses to represent different tasks.
test: add regression test with txt file
feat: add error handling of invalid inputs
feat: add deletion of tasks
refactor: follow module coding standards
commitResults.messageBody:
Update the following based on given code style/standard:
* change wildcard imports to single class imports
* remove indent for cases after switch statement
* rename boolean variables to sound like one

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to save tasks on disk
commitResults.messageBody:
Use text file with predefined format to maintain
state of task list during and between ChatBot
operations.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add date parsing for deadlines
commitResults.messageBody:
Allow users to pass in deadline in specified format,
with error checking. Also displays it in a more readable
way in task list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update test for deadline dates and delete command
Add data package to deal with task state
commitResults.messageBody:
Implement Storage and TaskList class to sync operations
on task list with backing file storage.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor logic to use data package
commitResults.messageBody:
Make use of TaskList class to better encapsulate list
of tasks maintained by ChatBot. Also use Storage class
to ensure consistency between TaskList state and
disk file data.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update test script to delete old data file
commitResults.messageBody:
Fix bug with regression test where it was failing
due to data from previous tests.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add gradle support
Add JUnit tests for task package
Configure gradle for shadowJar task
Update JavaDocs to meet module standards
commitResults.messageBody:
Change style of JavaDocs comment to follow coding
standards laid out for the module:
* Add period for parameters description
* Change class member Javadoc to single line

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code style by coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Fix the following style issues following given
coding standard:
* Add common prefix for command feedback constants
* Remove unused imports

commitResults.messageTitle: Add functionality to search task by keyword
Add Javadocs for overriden methods
commitResults.messageBody:
Add comments for overriden methods in subclasses
of Command to explain what each command does
when executed.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code to fix checkstyle violations
commitResults.messageBody:
Fix all errors under main with exceptions of Javadocs
and import statement orders, which will be left to later.

commitResults.messageTitle: Move main Duke class to duke package
Add initial support for GUI
commitResults.messageBody:
Initial version of GUI with minimal styling mostly
from provided JavaFX tutorial.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update response logic in application
commitResults.messageBody:
Change ChatBot to return response to application for
display instead of printing to stdout. Also renamed ui
package to chatbot as it is no longer in charge of ui.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix application not closing on exit command
Use FXML for application
commitResults.messageBody:
Change structuring of JavaFX application to use
FXML for main layout and dialog box.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add styling for application
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add background colors for all components
* Round image for duke and user avatar
* Add border to show text better

commitResults.messageTitle: Allow application to exit gracefully
Fix empty message on list command
commitResults.messageBody:
List command was showing an empty dialog
if list was empty. Change it to show a more
descriptive message.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add assertions for unverified assumptions
Delete dead code
commitResults.messageBody:
Remove EchoCommand from initial iteration,
and also functionalities related to old text-based
user interface.

commitResults.messageTitle: Combine mark and unmark task command
commitResults.messageBody:
The logic provided by MarkTask and UnmarkTaskCommand
class is nearly identical.

This resulted in high code duplication in the two tasks.

Let's combine the two classes by extracting out the logic
to differentiate between the two commands, so that the
combined class can perform either one of them.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor to adhere to coding quality guidelines
commitResults.messageBody:
The code has some unsafe practices such as no default
branches for switch statements, and general violations
affecting readability.

This can result in bugs and issue with maintainbility
in the future.

Let's refactor the code to fix these issues:
* Add default branch for switch statement to raise errors
* Follow SLAP in methods
* Update variable and method names to be more descriptive
